items.sentence: I guess Tom thought it was too late to come visit.
I had difficulty getting a ticket for the concert.
Tom himself sewed on the button that had come off.
Tom hopes that he can visit Boston before he dies.
We may never have another chance to do this again.
We only have enough food and water for three days.
We see each other at the supermarket now and then.
Tom isn\'t actually going to do that today, is he?
Tom turned on his flashlight and entered the cave.
Tom walked into the room and asked where Mary was.
